actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Scepter attacks or two Ice Shard attacks.

actions.name: Scepter
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 4 (1d6+1) bludgeoning damage + 4 (1d8) cold if not enlarged or 8 (2d6+1) bludgeoning damage if enlarged.

actions.name: Ice Shard
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit 60/240' one target 9 (1d10+4) piercing damage + 9 (2d8) cold.

actions.name: Summon Iceberg (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Chooses a point it can see within 120' of it. Each creature within a 20' of that point: 11 (2d10) bludgeoning damage and 7 (2d6) cold and is restrained until the end of its next turn (DC 14 Dex half damage and isn't restrained). Can't use this action while enlarged.

special_abilities.name: Icy Wrath
special_abilities.desc: Its weapons are imbued with icy magic. When it hits with any weapon deals + 4 (1d8) cold (included below). While enlarged it loses this bonus damage but AC increases to 16.

special_abilities.name: Reduce
special_abilities.desc: If it starts its turn enlarged it can choose to end the effect and return to its normal size (no action required).
